lead_paragraph: The head of Germany's Ifo economic institute believes Italians will eventually want to quit the euro currency area if their standard of living does not improve, he told German daily Tagesspiegel.
snippet: The head of Germany's Ifo economic institute believes Italians will eventually want to quit the euro currency area if their standard of living does not improve, he told German daily Tagesspiegel....

headline.main: German Ifo Think Tank Chief Says Italy Risks Quitting Euro Zone
headline.print_headline: German Ifo Think Tank Chief Says Italy Risks Quitting Euro Zone
